Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity class to represent "things" in the game: players, flags, jails, bases, etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int id
      unique ID for entity
      protected static int ID 
      static int MAX_SPEED
      maximum speed for a player for use in tournament

      current speed in x-direction of this entity

      the sprite that will represent this entity

      time scaling factor.

      current y-coordinate of this entity

      • updatePosition

        public final void updatePosition(long time,
                                 Field field,
                                 int id)
                          throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                 EntityOutOfBoundsException
        update the position of this entity using basic physics

        In each direction, we have new_position = current_position + speed * time_elapsed

        Note: TIME_SCALE will need to be manually adjusted to a value that allows good game play

        Parameters:
        time - is a length of time
        field - is the current field
        id - is supposed to the entity's id value
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException
        EntityOutOfBoundsException

      • checkCoordinates

        protected void checkCoordinates(Field field)
                         throws EntityOutOfBoundsException
        checks that this player is within the field boundaries
        Parameters:
        field - is the field that this entity is on
        Throws:
        EntityOutOfBoundsException

      • play

        public abstract void play(Field field)
        logic for this entity (change direction/speed)

        logic is based on current playing field (which holds information about all entities on the field) and possibly state of this entity. Do NOT update the entity's position here, just update speed.

        Parameters:
        field - is the current playing field

      • update

        public abstract void update(Field field)
        update this entity for any changes to it

        For example, if this entity is moved by another entity, this entity's positions need to be updated.

        Parameters:
        field - is the current playing field

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        override the equals method from Object

        This needs to be implemented in a child class

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - is an object to be tested for equality with this
        Returns:
        throws an exception
